app.title: Cost of Living Game
app.description: Learn to manage your budget in a realistic 6-month simulation

game.welcome: Welcome to the Cost of Living Challenge!
game.instructions: You have 6 months to manage your finances. Make smart decisions to reach your goals!

salary.title: 💰 What's your gross monthly income?
salary.description: This is your income before taxes are deducted
salary.explanation1: Your gross income determines your take-home pay after taxes
salary.explanation2: This affects how much you can allocate to different expense categories
salary.taxCalculation: We'll calculate your tax rate based on your location in the next step.

location.title: 📍 Location & Budget Setup
location.subtitle: Set up your living costs and location
location.importantNote1: • Housing costs are automatically deducted from your budget
location.importantNote2: • You'll allocate the remaining funds to other categories
location.importantNote3: • Random events will occur throughout the simulation

allocation.title: 💰 Budget Allocation - Round {iteration} of 12
allocation.subtitle: Allocate your bi-weekly budget across categories
allocation.allocateAmount: How much would you like to allocate to {category}?
allocation.savingsExhaustedMsg: You've used all your available savings.
allocation.fundsExhaustedUseSavings: You have allocated all available funds. Use your savings to continue allocating.
allocation.clickToUseSavings: Click below to use your savings for this allocation.
allocation.fundsAndSavingsExhaustedUseDebt: You have allocated all available funds and exhausted your savings. Use debt to continue allocating.
allocation.clickToUseDebt: Click below to use debt for this allocation (1/4 monthly salary limit per round).
allocation.fundsExhaustedCategoryZero: You have allocated all available funds. This category will be set to $0.
allocation.tipToAvoidDebtGrowth: 💡 Tip: To avoid your debt growing, you should allocate at least ${amount} to cover the interest.
allocation.debtInterestWarning: ⚠️ This amount will be added to your debt with 15% APR interest.
allocation.savingsAutoUseNote: This will be used automatically if you run out of money.
allocation.debtFromFixedCosts: ${amount} was added because your fixed costs exceeded your income.
allocation.debtInterestAccrual: Your debt will accrue 15% APR interest until paid off.
allocation.usingDebtAllocationShort: Using debt allocation (1/4 monthly salary per round)
allocation.fixedCostsExceedIncomeMsg: Your fixed costs (${fixedCosts}) exceed your available income (${income}).
allocation.debtWillBeAdded: ${amount} will be automatically added to your debt to cover essential expenses.
allocation.debtLimitReached: You have reached the debt limit for this round.
allocation.debtLimitReachedMsg: You have used the maximum debt allocation (1/4 monthly salary) for this round. This category will be set to $0.

events.carRepairs: 🚗 Oh no! Your car needs unexpected repairs.
events.utilityBill: ⚡ Surprise! Your utility bill is higher than expected.
events.medicalExpense: 🏥 Uh-oh! You had an unexpected medical expense.
events.workBonus: 🎉 Great news! You received a small bonus at work!
events.refund: 💫 Lucky you! You got a refund on an overcharge.
events.foundCash: 🧥 Nice! You found some extra cash in an old jacket!
events.homeRepair: 🏠 Bummer! Your home needs an urgent repair.
events.friendPayback: 🤝 Hey! A friend finally paid you back.
events.diningDiscount: 🍽️ Sweet! You got an unexpected dining discount.
events.onlineScam: ⚠️ Oh dear! You fell for a small online scam.
events.addedToDebt: This amount has been added to your debt.

toasts.estimatesFailed: Failed to get cost estimates. Using default values.

advice.title: Expert Advice
advice.askQuestion: Ask a question about budgeting or expenses...
advice.placeholder: How can I save money on groceries?
advice.unableToGet: Unable to get expert advice at this time. Please continue with your budget planning.
advice.unableToGetShort: Unable to get expert advice at this time.
advice.getFinalAdvice: Get final analysis of your 6-month budget journey

final.title: 🎉 Game Complete!
final.subtitle: You've successfully completed the 6-month budget simulation
final.getFinalAnalysisDescription: Get final analysis of your 6-month budget journey
